strength_details: Clear role focused on BI and DW tasks.
Exposure to cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google).
Opportunity to work for a well-established technology company (IBM).
concern_details: ASAP start date suggests potential for time pressure.
best_fit_details: Mid-level data engineers with 3+ years of experience.
Engineers with a background in data warehousing and BI.
Candidates with experience in cloud platforms.
probe_details: Clarify the reporting structure and manager expectations.
Understand the typical work hours and on-call expectations.
Inquire about the size and composition of the data engineering team.
summary.overall_assessment: This is a solid opportunity for a mid-level data engineer with a background in BI and DW. The role is well-defined and offers exposure to modern cloud technologies. The main drawbacks are the lack of visa sponsorship and potential for time pressure.
